    WaterfallPlot_v3

    WaterfallPlot_v3.Rd

    Alias of WaterfallPlot(), Seurat version

    WaterfallPlot_v3(
  seu,
  features,
  group.by = NULL,
  cell = NULL,
  cells = NULL,
  slot = "data",
  assay = NULL,
  priority = c("expr", "none"),
  ident.1 = NULL,
  ident.2 = NULL,
  exp.transform = (length == "logFC"),
  order = TRUE,
  length = "logFC",
  color = "p",
  len.threshold = 0,
  col.threshold = 0,
  color_theme = "BuRd",
  center_color = NULL,
  top.n = NULL,
  flip = FALSE,
  y.label = NULL,
  angle = NULL,
  hjust = NULL,
  vjust = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  style = c("bar", "segment")
)
